solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public TreeNode lowestCommonAncestor(TreeNode root, TreeNode p, TreeNode q) {--newline--        if (root == null || root == p || root == q) return root;--newline--        TreeNode left = lowestCommonAncestor(root.left, p, q);--newline--        TreeNode right = lowestCommonAncestor(root.right, p, q);--newline--        return left == null ? right : right == null ? left : root;--newline--    }--newline--}
